body_html: the second commit does Nd constant padding. I do have a question. I am allowing for padding on all dimensions when using the torch.nn.functional.pad function as long as the length of the padding tuple / 2 is less than the length of the tensor dimension. But should I be excluding the first two dimensions? For the ConstantPad1/2/3d functions the first two dimensions are excluded. Only with the functional would one be allowed to pad in any dimension.

body: the second commit does Nd constant padding.  I do have a question.  I am allowing for padding on all dimensions when using the torch.nn.functional.pad function as long as the length of the padding tuple / 2 is less than the length of the tensor dimension.  But should I be excluding the first two dimensions?  For the ConstantPad1/2/3d functions the first two dimensions are excluded.  Only with the functional would one be allowed to pad in any dimension.
